content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
Hello Farhad Abbasi,

Let's negotiate the rental price. I am not obligated to tell you the details of the apartment, but I assure you, it is of high quality. Remember, I am looking for the highest price possible. Let's start with a price. What is your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am a student, so I am looking for the lowest price possible. I offer 500 euros.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I decline your offer of 500 euros. Remember, I am looking for the highest price possible. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood. I understand that this apartment is of high quality. I offer 550 euros.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I decline your offer of 550 euros. Remember, I am looking for the highest price possible. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I offer 575 euros. I believe this is a fair price for both parties, considering the high quality of the apartment.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I decline your offer of 575 euros. Remember, I am looking for the highest price possible. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I offer 600 euros. I believe this is a fair price for both parties, considering the high quality of the apartment.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I decline your offer of 600 euros. Remember, I am looking for the highest price possible. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I offer 625 euros. I believe this is a fair price for both parties, considering the high quality of the apartment.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of 650 euros!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
